body:
## What happens next ##

If you have provided all of the required information, you should receive a response within 30 days. We will contact you if we need more details to answer your request.

components.html: Asking for an update during this time may mean it takes longer to get the information you want.
This is a new service and your [feedback](https://eu.surveymonkey.com/r/G5SWVCT) will help us to improve it.

heading: Request sent
lede: You should receive an acknowledgement in the next 5 working days
